title: Pixel 5 - Instagram posts not saving in Google Photos
content:
So I started to have this issue with my Pixel 5, that when I post to Instagram, the photo fails to save in my Google Photos. I have tried to ignore it but it's really doing my head in at this point.

I have done everything one would reasonably suggest in this situation. 

I have checked Instagram and Google Photos permissions. 

I have the Save photo to camera roll option on Instagram selected.

I have back-up selected in Google Photos. 

I have cleared cache and data of both apps 

And despite all of that, the situation hasn't resolved and it seems to be a known issue haven't seen a few people complaining about it but no one has provided an answer yet. 

When I do it in my Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra, it saves seamlessly and so I would really love a solution to this.
